articles.title: Drinking Two to Three Cups of Coffee Daily Is Linked With a Longer Lifespan - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Drinking two to three cups of coffee a day is associated with a longer lifespan and a lower risk of cardiovascular disease compared with avoiding coffee. This is according to new research published on September 27 in the European Journal of Preventive Cardiol…
articles.content:
